name: Perpetual Protocol
introduce: Perpetual protocol is a decentralized perpetual contracts protocol for every asset powered by a Virtual Automated Market Maker (vAMM). The project aims to create novel financial instruments by democratizing Futures and other crypto-asset derivatives.The protocol is capable of supporting 20x leverage, short positions, and lower slippage compared to other AMMs thanks to its virtual AMM (vAMM) design.
